content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I am sure you will love the apartment. Now, about the rental price, I am looking for a monthly rent of €1000. Let's negotiate towards that number.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for a monthly rent of €1000, but I'm a student and I'm looking to keep my expenses as low as possible. Can we discuss a lower price that would be more manageable for me?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Sure, Max. I am willing to negotiate. What is your proposed rent amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a student, I'm really looking to save as much as possible. I was hoping we could start at around €800 per month. I think that would be a fair price considering my situation.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, Max. However, €800 is too low for me. I am willing to go down to €900, but that is the lowest I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €900 is closer to what I'm looking for. Could we potentially meet in the middle at €850? I think that would be a reasonable compromise for both of us.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I am not entirely satisfied with €850, Max. However, I am willing to compromise. I propose €875. That is as low as I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €875 is getting closer to my budget. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to include some utilities in that price, such as water or heating? That would help me further.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I apologize, Max, but I do not offer any utilities included in the rent. I am strictly a landlord and do not provide any additional services. The rent is €875, and any additional utilities would be at an extra cost.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. No utilities included, okay. Well, I think €875 is a fair price considering the location and the amenities of the apartment. I agree to the price of €875 Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [x] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of €875 Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of €875 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
